gesture_recog module¶

gesture_recog.callback(data)¶
gesture_recog.coord_select()¶

Function to display a grid and select the destination point

xy
X and Y coordinates of the point selected
gesture_recog.main()¶

Main code for gesture recognition

After receiving the “play” command, displays a 1000x1000 grid as the workspace to select a play destination. Publishes the selected coordinates

subscribe: /gesture_request (std_msgs.String) publish: /move_coords (geometry_msgs.Point)
